segments.text: Jack , I don't know how to write my resume . Could you tell me about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should first write your name and contact information .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does the contact information include ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Such as your land line phone number , mobile phone number and e-mail box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you should write your objectives , such as seeking a position in foreign trade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . It is the position desired
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . After that you should emphasize your skills , educational background and related experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Skills are about specialty , and educational background is easy as well . But what about related experience ? I have little work experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . It will take time to accumulate experience . You need to be confident for yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . By the way , should I write the educational background starting from elementary school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . I will write it right now .
segments.speaker: S1
